name: assintopasslaw
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cassintop, c1)), wbr(c0, casslaw, c1))

stmt.origin: simprd(wcel(c0, cfv(cassintop, c1)), wbr(c0, casslaw, c1), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cassintop, c1)), wbr(c0, casslaw, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cassintop, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c1), wbr(c0, casslaw, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(assIntOp ` c1)→ c0[assLaw]c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈(assIntOp ` c1)→((c0 :(c1 × c1)→ c1)∧ c0[assLaw]c1))

comment: The associative low holds for a associative (closed internal binary) operation for a set. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (Revised by AV, 20-Jan-2020.)
